ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Questions....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Erudia ... No, too long a recast time, not to mention I think the stun of a bash breaks WTYH still ... Most definitely, less chance of failure.  better yet
ygData.messageBody:
"(Zhian)" wrote:

>
> Well, after the wonderful responces to my previous question, I have more for
> you. =)
>
> 1) Is an Agnostic DE Enchanter KoS in Erudin?
> I was late getting beck to the office over lunch and had just received the
> Erud's Tonic from the Erudite in the library using illusion Halfelf and
> Alliance. I am "parked" in front of the illusion merchant on the 2nd floor
> and bound at the wood bridge in NK.
>
> 2) Where is illusion Halfling?
>

Erudia

>
> 2) Is it possible to chain cast WTYH while your pet kills a mob as you med
> up to continue casting WTYH?
>

No, too long a recast time, not to mention I think the stun of a bash breaks WTYH
still

>
> 3) Or is it safer to root, fear?
>

Most definitely, less chance of failure. better yet team up with a druid or some
such to snare the monster.

>
> 4) Does Languid Pace effect movement rate of the mob when it is in "run
> mode" or only attack speed?
>

attack speed only

>
> 5) For the Coin of Tash:
> Do you only give the combined coin to the next npc(s) or do you need to
> give them gold to?
> How much xp does it give at 12th level?
> Is it like all the Temple quests and gives no xp anymore or do you get xp
> at each person the "changes" the coin?
>
> I will think up more as time passes. Thanks.
>
> --
> Zhian *Dragons of Kel`Dar*
> 12th Facet on the Jewel of Norrath
> Xegony

--
/Nosferatu
Make us both a bit of cash:
http:/www.alladvantage.com/go.asp?refid=clg247
